name: light fall post jam (unfinished update)
description:
*This is still in development any bugs or odd occurrences please leave a comment*

this will not work in the brave browser, Microsoft Edge should be fine  

ad -move

wall slide to regain  light(life) and hold the direction  while falling against a wall to wall slide 

arrows shoot left and right up and down

shift to dash left or right

t to trade your light(life) for a gun upgrade 

thanks to lightspeed06 and glockenberg for being a part of the team 

An adventurous lantern descends into the dark abyss to destroy the Lich and break the light fall curse
